channel.title: Lurzu - Web Programming/Development Forum (Project)
channel.description:
Lurzu is a new Web Development/Programming Forum for enthusiast or just for people who need help with coding/programming.
My goal is to create a huge member base, with active users so when someone needs help coding/programming they will always have a place to go for they're needs. Right now Lurzu doesn't have a big member base and that's where every one of you individuals can help this man(me) create my dream and have a successful community like Moparscape. So if you will please help me out and register by going to Lurzu.com or click the text "Join" below that's colored blue.
I'm not giving up on this project even if it puts me through hell because I have plenty of time on my hands while I try and find me another job, and when I find one I'm still going to put all of the spare time I have into this site and make my dream come true.
[B]If you would like to become part of the Lurzu Team than add me on Skype my username is: [/B][I]OfficialLurzu[/I]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ioe040.png[/img]

item.title: Lurzu - Web Programming/Development Forum (Project)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Well, it’s looking good for a base design. It’s lacking content though. All I’m seeing is rounded corners and gradient backgrounds. I suggest you update the template a good amount, and have everything flow together more nicely. Other than that, it looks like a pretty decent design (as a starting base).

Read full topic

item.title: Lurzu - Web Programming/Development Forum (Project)
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

You have chosen some poor colors. They don’t blend together and honestly… the background of the website is ugly.

Check out what I’m currently working on:

All the colors blend and go together. May want to go through some tutorials on how colors blend and how they work together to make a stunning website…

Read full topic

Lurzu is a new Web Development/Programming Forum for enthusiast or just for people who need help with coding/programming.

My goal is to create a huge member base, with active users so when someone needs help coding/programming they will always have a place to go for they’re needs.
